statements: DELETE FROM ApplianceUsagePatterns WHERE appliance_type = 'FRIDGE' AND usage_hours < 100
DELETE FROM maintenance_history WHERE appliance_id = 1 AND maintenance_type = 'scheduled'
DELETE FROM appliance_sensors WHERE sensor_type='temperature' AND sensor_value > 100.0;
DELETE FROM appliance_data WHERE usage_hours < 50 AND last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM appliance_usage WHERE appliance_id = 100 AND usage_hours > 500;
DELETE FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'repair' AND technician_name = 'John Doe';
